naslov: Ražanj, VILLA (roh-bau) S PROJEKTOM / PRVI RED MORE - čitaj opis (prodaja)
opis: - prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. NAPOMENA: detaljne slike i video postojećeg stanja (roh-bau), lokaciju, projekt, dozvole itd. šaljemo na upit - vlasnik je zamolio da ga potencijani klijenti NE POKUŠAVAJU kontaktirati direktno. Za sva pitanja Vam stojimo mi na raspolaganju. Ova nedovršena vila u roh-bau izdanju nalazi se u samoj uvali (Kalebova luka), na samo nekoliko koraka od kristalno čistog mora i predivne plaže. Vila ima projekt i plaćene sve dozvole i odobrenja za gradnju, tako da možete odmah nastaviti s radovima i urediti je po vašem ukusu i potrebama. + gradnja 2013.godine (statika objekta uredna) + plaćene sve dozvole + 'otvoreno gradilište' + postojeća infrastruktura + mogućnost nadupune postojeće građevinske dozvole Vila se prostire na dvije etaže, ukupne površine 250 m2, na zemljištu od 600 m2. OPIS PO PROJEKTU: Na etaži prizemlja nalaze se dvije spavaće sobe sa dva kupatila, konoba za druženje, unutarnje stepenište i izlaz na terasu s bazenom. Na drugoj etaži je spavaća soba s vlastitom kupaonicom i balkonom, dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonom i ostavom. S balkona se pruža prekrasan pogled na more i obalu. Vila ima i veliku terasu s bazenom (6X4), idealnu za opuštanje i uživanje u sunčanim danima. Nalazi se na top lokaciji, u mirnom i slikovitom mjestu, okruženom zelenilom. / DETALJI NA UPIT / ENG.......................................................................... - sale of #adriaINgroup agency - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% of the sales price Dear clients, viewing the property is only possible with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. NOTE: detailed pictures and video of the existing condition (roh-bau), location, project, permits, etc. are sent upon request - the owner asked that potential clients DO NOT try to contact him directly. We are at your disposal for all questions. This unfinished Rohbau villa is located in the bay itself (Kalebova luka), just a few steps from the crystal clear sea and the beautiful beach. The villa has a project and all building permits and approvals have been paid, so you can immediately proceed with the work and arrange it according to your taste and needs. + construction in 2013 (statics of the building are in order) + all licenses paid + 'open construction site' + existing infrastructure + the possibility of supplementing the existing construction permit The villa is spread over two floors, with a total area of 250 m2, on a plot of land of 600 m2. DESCRIPTION BY PROJECT: On the ground floor there are two bedrooms with two bathrooms, a tavern for socializing, an internal staircase and an exit to the terrace with a swimming pool. On the second floor, there is a bedroom with a private bathroom and a balcony, a living room with a kitchen and dining room, and a storage room. The balcony offers a beautiful view of the sea and the coast. The villa also has a large terrace with a swimming pool (6X4), ideal for relaxing and enjoying sunny days. It is located in a top location, in a quiet and picturesque place, surrounded by greenery. / DETAILS ON REQUEST / #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
